name: installTap(onBus:bufferSize:format:block:)
desc: Installs an audio tap on a bus you specify to record, monitor, and observe the output of the node.
declaration:
func installTap(onBus bus: AVAudioNodeBus, 
     bufferSize: AVAudioFrameCount, 
         format: AVAudioFormat?, 
          block tapBlock: @escaping AVAudioNodeTapBlock)
